root.name: Stellar 7: Draxon's Revenge
root.description: OverviewAs in the other versions of this Dynamix title, players are tasked with stopping Gir Draxon's earth-bound invasion. They will fight off wave after wave of Acturan crafts, huge Guardians, and travel from planet to planet using warp gates. On Arcturas, the final battle with Draxon himself awaits. FeaturesCD AudioEnhanced graphics, taking advantage of the 3DO's capabilitiesDigitized voice, including narration by Michael DornSignificantly higher difficulty than earlier versions, with only one life and no continues
